content.description: A group of farmers want to change their pest control methods to reduce the amount of pollution in a nearby river. The data on the cost and percent pest population reduction for several methods of pest control the farmers could consider are presented in the table below.
content.question: Pest Control Method Physical Traps Single Dose of Pesticides Genetically Modified Crops Natural Predator Introduction Cost (<math alttext="U S" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>US</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> Dollars) <math alttext="$5,000" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>000</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="$8,000" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>8</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>000</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="$9,500" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>9</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>500</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="$10,000" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>10</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>000</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> Reduction in Pest Population (<math alttext="percent" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>%</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>) <math alttext="25" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>25</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="80" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>80</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="95" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>95</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="50" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>50</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> Which of the following methods should the farmers choose to minimize the cost for efficient pest removal while still reaching their goal of reducing the amount of pollution in the river?

choices.label: Applying a single dose of pesticides
Introducing a natural predator to feed on the pests

skill.text: Skill 7.D: Use data and evidence to support a potential solution.
